biocontainers.name: genclust
biocontainers.summary: A genetic algorithm for clustering gene expression data.

biotools.summary: New genetic algorithm for clustering gene expression data. It has two key features: (a) a novel coding of the search space that is simple, compact and easy to update; (b) it can be used naturally in conjunction with data driven internal validation methods.

bioschemas.name: GenClust
bioschemas.summary: New genetic algorithm for clustering gene expression data. It has two key features: (a) a novel coding of the search space that is simple, compact and easy to update; (b) it can be used naturally in conjunction with data driven internal validation methods.
